QAPair.Question: What is (are) Interstitial lung disease - adults - discharge ?
QAPair.Answer: You were in the hospital to treat your breathing problems that are caused by interstitial lung disease . This disease scars your lungs, which makes it hard for your body to get enough oxygen.

Question.qtype: when to contact a medical professional

QAPair.Question: Do I need to see a doctor for Interstitial lung disease - adults - discharge ?
